verses.text: Therefore, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w* and \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*:

And I will turn thee \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and leave but the sixth \w part|strong="H8338"\w* of thee, and will cause thee to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w parts|strong="H3411"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:\f + \fr 39.2 \ft leave…: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth\f*\f + \fr 39.2 \ft the north…: Heb. the sides of the north\f*

And I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thy \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* out of thy \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and will cause thine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* out of thy \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thou shalt \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou, and all thy \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add is\add* with thee: I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee unto the \w ravenous|strong="H5861"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* of every \w sort|strong="H3671"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* to be \w devoured|strong="H0402"\w*.\f + \fr 39.4 \ft sort: Heb. wing\f*\f + \fr 39.4 \ft to be…: Heb. to devour\f*

Thou shalt \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: for I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 39.5 \ft the open…: Heb. the face of the field\f*

And I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* on \w Magog|strong="H4031"\w*, and among them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w carelessly|strong="H0983"\w* in the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w*: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 39.6 \ft carelessly: or, confidently\f*

So will I make my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and I will not \add let them\add* \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* any more: and the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Behold, it is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and it is \w done|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; this \add is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* whereof I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

And they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and shall \w set|strong="H1197"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* and \w burn|strong="H5400"\w* the \w weapons|strong="H5402"\w*, both the \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* and the \w bucklers|strong="H6793"\w*, the \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* and the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and the \w handstaves|strong="H3027"\w*, and the \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, and they shall \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* them with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:\f + \fr 39.9 \ft handstaves: or, javelins\f*\f + \fr 39.9 \ft burn them…: or, make a fire of them\f*

So that they shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* no \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, neither cut \w down|strong="H2404"\w* \add any\add* out of the \w forests|strong="H3293"\w*; for they shall \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* the \w weapons|strong="H5402"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and they shall \w spoil|strong="H7997"\w* those that \w spoiled|strong="H7997"\w* them, and \w rob|strong="H0962"\w* those that \w robbed|strong="H0962"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* there of \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w passengers|strong="H5674"\w* on the \w east|strong="H6926"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: and it shall \w stop|strong="H2629"\w* the \add noses\add* of the \w passengers|strong="H5674"\w*: and there shall they \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w* and all his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*: and they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \add it\add* The \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Hamon-gog|strong="H1996"\w*.\f + \fr 39.11 \ft noses: or, mouths\f*\f + \fr 39.11 \ft Hamon-gog: that is, The multitude of Gog\f*

And \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* shall the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be \w burying|strong="H6912"\w* of them, that they may \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Yea, all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \add them;\add* and it shall be to them a \w renown|strong="H8034"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I shall be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

And they shall sever \w out|strong="H0914"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of continual \w employment|strong="H8548"\w*, passing \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* with the \w passengers|strong="H5674"\w* those that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* it: after the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* shall they \w search|strong="H2713"\w*.\f + \fr 39.14 \ft men…: Heb. men of continuance\f*

And the \w passengers|strong="H5674"\w* \add that\add* pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, when \add any\add* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* a \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*, then shall he set \w up|strong="H1129"\w* a \w sign|strong="H6725"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* it, till the \w buriers|strong="H6912"\w* have \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* it in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Hamon-gog|strong="H1996"\w*.\f + \fr 39.15 \ft set up: Heb. build\f*

And also the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Hamonah|strong="H1997"\w*. Thus shall they \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 39.16 \ft Hamonah: that is, The multitude\f*

¶ And, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto every \w feathered|strong="H3671"\w* \w fowl|strong="H6833"\w*, and to every \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w Assemble|strong="H6908"\w* yourselves, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* yourselves on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w* to my \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* that I do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* for you, \add even\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that ye may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 39.17 \ft unto…: Heb. to the fowl of every wing\f*\f + \fr 39.17 \ft my sacrifice: or, my slaughter\f*

Ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, of \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, and of \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, of \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, all of them \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.\f + \fr 39.18 \ft goats: Heb. great goats\f*

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* till ye be \w full|strong="H7654"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* till ye be \w drunken|strong="H7943"\w*, of my \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* which I have \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* for you.

Thus ye shall be \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* at my \w table|strong="H7979"\w* with \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, with mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and with all \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* that I have \w executed|strong="H6213"\w*, and my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* that I have \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* upon them.

So the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forward|strong="H1973"\w*.

¶ And the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: because they \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against me, therefore \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* I my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from them, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*: so \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* they all by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

According to their \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* and according to their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto them, and \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from them.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Now will I bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will be \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*;

After that they have \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, and all their \w trespasses|strong="H4604"\w* whereby they have \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against me, when they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and none made \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

When I have brought them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* them out of their \w enemies’|strong="H0341"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, and am \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in them in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*;

Then shall they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which caused them to be led into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*: but I have \w gathered|strong="H3664"\w* them unto their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and have \w left|strong="H3498"\w* none of them any more there.\f + \fr 39.28 \ft which…: Heb. by my causing of them, etc\f*

Neither will I \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* any more from them: for I have poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
